body.name: KUYOYGA Shredded Memory Foam Pillows Standard Size Set of 2 - Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping 2 Pack - Medium Frim Bamboo Pillows for Side & Back Sleeper with Washable Removable Cover
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: Adjustable Firmness - Compared with traditional pillows, the design of the shredded memory foam pillow allows you to access the memory foam fillings, so you can simply add or remove the foam fillings to suit your body type, shape or sleeping position to find the perfect level of comfort and enjoy the luxury of a five-star hotel experience at home.

Excellent Neck & Shoulder Support - Crafted with 80% shredded memory foam and 20% microfiber blend. When you lie down, memory foam can provide support evenly to your neck so that your shoulder pain can be relieved, at the same time, the microfiber blend makes the pillow soft. Ideal for side, back and stomach sleepers.

Cooling & Soft Fabric Pillow Cover - We made different materials for the A/B side of the pillowcase. A side fabric content cooling material, it can wicks away moisture, keep cooling and dry all night long. B side crafted with with breathable bamboo rayon, that's permeable and soft to the touch.

Standard Size Pillows FIive-star Hotel Quality - Certified with CertiPUR-US, certification to ensure your health and product quality. Our memory foam is an eco-conscious, high-performance material, offering exceptional resilience, durability, and temperature control. Let you spend a sweet sleep with peace of mind.

Warm Tips - Pillows standard size set of 2 come vacuum sealed for shipping. when you open the package, please pat them fully to restore shape and wait 24 hours before using the pillows to sleep. If you have any quality problems after purchasing the products, please feel free to contact us and we will solve them as soon as possible.
body.description: Sizing Information: Available in Standard & Queen & King ! Our Luxury Bamboo Memory Foam Pillow is the ideal pillow for all sleepers. It comes encased in our luxury bamboo casing and filled with the highest quality cross-cut memory foam. Standard Size - 26” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height Queen Size - 29” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height King Size - 35” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height Adjust the pillow height to your preference - Just remove fill!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable inner gel memory foam filling Our Luxury Pillow gives any type of sleeper comfort without sacrificing support or losing shape. Take control of your sleep with adjustable Certi-PUR US-certified cross-cut foam filling. Simply unzip our ultra-soft Rayon derived from Bamboo casing, unzip the pillow, and add OR remove foam to your liking. Naturally cooling Never search for the “cool side” of the pillow again! Our pillows are naturally cooling, adapting to your body’s temperature as you sleep. It wicks away moisture, allowing for a cool, comfortable, better night’s sleep. Machine washable outside pillows cover There are zippers on the cover, you can take off it easily. Very easy care. The outside bed pillows cover is machine washable (machine wash cold and liquid detergents if needed; DO NOT use bleach). The inner pillow cover and inner filling are not washable.

What about us? We’re dedicated to providing you with the best sleep of your life! Our Luxury Bamboo Memory Foam Pillow is made using a time tested and carefully measured process to ensure our product is made to last. Washing Tips: Unpack the vacuum sealed bags, squeeze, pat or fold your pillows. Let it air out for 24 h to inflate completely, pillows would rebound to original full size. Fluff the pillow regularly to retain its shape after long-term use. Sizing Information: Available in Standard & Queen & King ! Our Luxury Bamboo Memory Foam Pillow is the ideal pillow for all sleepers. It comes encased in our luxury bamboo casing and filled with the highest quality cross-cut memory foam. Standard Size - 26” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height Queen Size - 29” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height King Size - 35” Length, 19” Width, 7” Adjustable Height Adjust the pillow height to your preference - Just remove fill!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are amazing and so comfortable!!! Was really impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For the Price..excellent buy
reviews.reviewText: I saw these on a deal and bought them for an extra bedroom. They came in squished in a box and they were extremely hard to get out. I did fluff them up. There were no instructions on how to do that, though sometimes they tell you to put them in the dryer but since there were no instructions, I did not do that, They fluffed up pretty well. I did think they would fluff up a little more based on the description, but I am happy with them . If I saw them on a good deal again, I would buy them, but I would not pay full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pillows are great, love them soft and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality, soft pillows, good for neck pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent set of two standard cooling memory foam pillows that you can stuff to your liking.
reviews.reviewText: For some unknown reason, I have trouble finding good pillows to sleep on. I've had lots of expensive pillows that worked fine for a couple of months and then started giving me neck pain in the mornings. So I ordered this set of memory foam pillows which are also cooling pillows. These come with stuffing so you can decide whether you want to leave yours as it is on arrival or remove or add more stuffing.These are very well made pillows with a bamboo cover that you can remove for washing. The zipper works well and doesn't get in my way, and since I sleep on my side I used all the stuffing in my pillows. These are soft and comfortable but not flat, except they're vacuum sealed when they arrive. It takes a couple of days for these to fluff up nicely.One side of each pillow is a cooling pillow, and the other side is a breathable bamboo rayon. Both sides are comfortable for me, but I prefer the cooling side. These pillows are also very good for reading in bed.I use a silk pillowcase on my pillow because I've had some damage to my hair, and that's good for repairing and not knotting your hair. I still get the cooling features very well, just as if I didn't have a pillowcase on it.These are excellent pillows, stuffed with memory foam that you can remove or add since the pillows come with a bag of extra stuffing. The company provides information about how to stuff these for back sleepers, stomach sleepers, and side sleepers. They have a bamboo pillow cover which is easy to zip and unzip so you can wash them. I didn't put my pillow covers in the dryer. Finally, I have a comfortable, cooling pillow - actually two of them - that's remained comfortable ever since I received it.I highly recommend this set of pillows, which also come in queen and king sizes. They're very well made, comfortable, and have several different features. I sleep on my side, so I put all the stuffing in the pillows as instructed. These are sold at a great price point and should last a good long time with proper care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft yet firm
reviews.reviewText: Definitely drifts you into lala land without counting sheep. They come vacuum sealed so be prepared to wait like a day before laying on them in order to get the best feeling from them. (In my opinion).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy Slumber Awaits
reviews.reviewText: The Shredded Memory Foam Pillows have turned my nights into a luxurious retreat, earning their well-deserved 5-star rating for their comfort, cooling properties, and the blissful support they offer for side and back sleepers.First and foremost, the shredded memory foam is a game-changer. It conforms to my unique sleeping position, providing a personalized level of support that caters to both side and back sleeping preferences. The medium firmness strikes the perfect balance, offering plush comfort without sacrificing necessary support.The cooling properties of these pillows are heavenly. The bamboo cover enhances breathability, promoting a cool and comfortable sleep environment. No more tossing and turning – these pillows keep me pleasantly cool throughout the night, ensuring uninterrupted slumber.The standard size is perfect for a snug fit on my bed, and the set of 2 is a thoughtful addition. They come neatly packaged and fluff up beautifully upon opening. The loftiness of the pillows adds to the overall plushness, creating a luxurious sleeping experience.The washable and removable cover is a practical touch. Easy maintenance ensures that the pillows remain fresh and hygienic over time. The quality craftsmanship is evident in the durable stitching and zipper, promising long-lasting performance.These pillows have become my go-to choice for a restful night's sleep. The support they provide for my neck and head is unparalleled, and the luxurious feel adds a touch of indulgence to my bedtime routine.In conclusion, the Shredded Memory Foam Pillows Set of 2 is a 5-star investment for anyone seeking a restful and rejuvenating sleep experience. Their comfort, cooling features, and quality design make them a standout choice. I highly recommend these pillows to fellow Amazon shoppers – they're the key to dreamy slumber every night. Cheers to restful and blissful sleep!
